pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Disclosure Control Methods for Anonymization of Data and Risk Estimation // Data from statistical agencies and other institutions are mostly confidential. This package can be used for the generation of anonymized (micro)data, i.e. for the creation of public- and scientific-use files. In addition, various risk estimation methods are included. Note that the package includes a graphical user interface that allows to use various methods of this package.
